Maggots to Flies.name: Maggots to Flies
Maggots to Flies.flavor: Your foes are horrified when squirming maggots bulge from their bodies, then transform into biting flies.
Maggots to Flies.onHit: 2d6 + Wisdom modifier damage, and you can slide the target up to 2 squares.
Maggots to Flies.effect: Until the end of your next turn, each target grants combat advantage and gains vulnerable 5 to all damage.

From One to Many.name: From One to Many
From One to Many.flavor: Your body collapses into a seething cloud of ravenous insects. They devour anything in their path.
From One to Many.effect: Each target takes ongoing 20 poison damage (save ends). You then shift up to half your speed. Each time the target takes the ongoing damage, you can slide it 1 square as a free action.
From One to Many.requirement: The power From One to Many must be active in order to use this power.

Hive Mind.name: Hive Mind
Hive Mind.flavor: Your consciousness worms its way into you alliesâ€™ minds. You all now fight with a single purpose.
Hive Mind.target: You and each ally in the burst
Hive Mind.effect: Until the end of the encounter, each target can communicate telepathically with any of the other targets within 20 squares. In addition, enemies cannot gain combat advantage by flanking a target, and you can use a move action to slide another target within 10 squares of you up to 5 squares.
